  1. from django.views.generic.base import View
  2. from django.views.generic.detail import SingleObjectMixin
  3. from django.http import HttpResponse
  5. from braces.views import JSONResponseMixin, LoginRequiredMixin
  7. from ftp_deploy.conf import *
  8. from ftp_deploy.models import Service
  9. from ftp_deploy.utils.curl import curl_connection
  10. from ftp_deploy.utils.core import absolute_url
  14. class BitbucketAPIView(LoginRequiredMixin, JSONResponseMixin, SingleObjectMixin, View):
  16. """View for managing BitBucket API"""
  18. model = Service
  20. def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  21. self.bitbucket_username = BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['username']
  22. self.bitbucket_password = BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['password']
  23. return super(BitbucketAPIView, self).dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
  26. def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  27. curl = curl_connection(self.bitbucket_username, self.bitbucket_password)
  28. curl.authenticate()
  30. url = 'https://api.bitbucket.org/1.0/repositories'
  31. post = 'name=project_name&is_private=True'
  32. context = curl.perform_post(url,post)
  34. curl.close()
  37. return HttpResponse(context)
  40. def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  41. try:
  43. curl = curl_connection(self.bitbucket_username, self.bitbucket_password)
  44. curl.authenticate()
  45. post = str()
  47. if self.request.POST['data'] == 'respositories':
  48. context = self.repositories(curl)
  49. elif self.request.POST['data'] == 'addhook':
  50. context = self.add_hook(curl, request)
  52. return self.render_json_response(context)
  54. finally:
  55. curl.close()
  57. return HttpResponse()
  59. def repositories(self, curl):
  60. """Load list of repositories from bitbucket account"""
  62. url = 'https://bitbucket.org/api/1.0/user/repositories'
  63. context = curl.perform(url)
  64. return context
  66. def add_hook(self, curl, request):
  67. """Add hook and change repo_hook flag for service"""
  69. service = self.get_object()
  70. url = 'https://api.bitbucket.org/1.0/repositories/%s/%s/services/ ' % (self.bitbucket_username, self.get_object().repo_slug_name)
  71. post = 'type=POST&URL=%s%s' % (absolute_url(request).build(), service.hook_url())
  72. service.repo_hook = True
  73. service.save()
  74. context = curl.perform_post(url, post)
  75. return context
  77. def add_respository(self, curl):
  78. """Add respository to repository account"""
  80. url = 'https://api.bitbucket.org/1.0/repositories'
  81. post = 'name=project_name'
  82. context = curl.perform_post(url,post)
  83. return context
